name: Dennis Kimathi
bio: Visionary leader committed to transformation. Dennis guides the DEKIMU Space Organisation in nurturing holistic and exceptional leadership among members, inspiring innovation and positive change.
fact: Passionate about empowering future leaders and building a transformative community.

name: Hibaq Noor
bio: Empowering the next generation of change-makers. Hibaq drives holistic growth, mental health empowerment, and academic mastery for all members.
fact: Believes in shaping strong minds, sharp voices, and bold leaders.

name: Tithe Itumo
bio: Dedicated to holistic and exceptional leadership. Tithe organizes activities that promote transformation, purpose-driven growth, and vision-driven action.
fact: Advocate for positive change and excellence in all spheres of life.
